txt.en: While riding on the plains of Kingstead, you have encountered vicious Wargs lurking outside Middlemead and the nearby farmhouses. These foul creatures must be defeated to protect the riders and crofters of Middlemead as they make ready to journey to Edoras.
You have slain many Wargs on the fields near Middlemead, and spared the Rohirrim a grisly fate in their waiting jaws.
Vicious Wargs roam the plains of Kingstead, striking fear into the hearts of the people of Middlemead.
You see yet more Wargs lurking nearby.

Wargs can be found to the south of Middlemead in northern Kingstead.\n\nYou have encountered Wargs of the White Hand on the plains of Kingstead. You should defeat them to keep their jaws from the people of Middlemead.
You have slain a great many Wargs on the fields of Kingstead.
